comment.author: 64288588@N05
comment._content:
OLIPHANT, W J
Rank:Private
Service No:S/6349
Date of Death:18/08/1916
Age:38
Regiment/Service:Argyll and Sutherland Highlanders 2nd Bn. 
Grave ReferenceXII. G. 36.
CemeteryCATERPILLAR VALLEY CEMETERY, LONGUEVAL
Additional Information: Son of the late William John Oliphant; husband of Jessie Oliphant, of 189, Hunters St., Glasgow. Born at Aberdeen.

William John Oliphant junior was born circa 1878 in Kintore, Aberdeenshire. In 1881 he was living at Milton Brodes, Alves, Morayshire. His parents were William John and Ann and he had a younger sister, Sarah Jane.

comment.author: 38811045@N04
comment._content: Enlisted 13th November 1914.  Service record survives in WO 363.
